metadata.description: For the committed outsider, adolescence can be a nightmare of constructing elaborate strategies in order to avoid the narrow paths society has paved for us. Purgatory by Casanova Frankenstein may at first appear to be a classic case of avoidance – but this is not a story about dysfunctional coping techniques. It’s the triumphant tale of an individual who doggedly refuses to be atomized into the mass.
metadata.name: Purgatory
